bibl.title: Letter from John J. Moran to Jefferson Randolph Kean, March 2, 1901

div1.p: Moran acknowledges receipt of a check.

div1.head: Letter from John J. Moran to Jefferson Randolph Kean, March 2, 1901
div1.opener:
Cor. Fairmount & Euclid Ave.,
Cleveland, Ohio, March 2, 1901";
Major J. R. Kean,
Surgeon, U. S. A.
Columbia Bk's, Cuba.
Sir:-
div1.p:
I beg to acknowledge receipt of yours
of Feb'y 24, 1901, enclosing Check No. 131,672
on North American Trust Co for One
hundred and thirty Dollars ($130.00).

Thanking you very much for same
and for past favors, I am,
